query:
UPDATE kafka_trigger
            SET
                kafka_resource_path = $1,
                group_id = $2,
                topics = $3,
                filters = $4,
                script_path = $5,
                path = $6,
                is_flow = $7,
                edited_by = $8,
                email = $9,
                edited_at = now(),
                server_id = NULL,
                error = NULL,
                error_handler_path = $12,
                error_handler_args = $13,
                retry = $14
            WHERE
                workspace_id = $10 AND path = $11
